mapper.select: select flow.*,DATE_FORMAT(pay_time, '%m-%d %H:%i:%s') pay_time_format from user_account_flow flow,user_account a where flow.ACCOUNT_ID = a.id and user_no = #{user_no} and DATE_FORMAT(PAY_TIME,'%Y-%m') = #{month} and flow.pay_status = '1' order by pay_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into user_account_flow(ACCOUNT_ID,JOURNAL_MONEY,JOURNAL_DIR, JOURNAL_TYPE,ORDER_ID,PAY_TYPE,PAY_TIME,PAY_CHANNEL_NO,JOURNAL_REMARK,PAY_STATUS, CREATED_BY,created_time) values (#{account_id},#{journal_money},#{journal_dir}, #{journal_type},#{order_id},#{pay_type},#{pay_time},#{pay_channel_no},#{journal_remark},#{pay_status}, '微信通知',now())
